q1: I really love the team Paris SG
a1: Paris SG are the best from France, I respect them.
q2: Why do you respect them? To me it feels like they have bought the league.
a2: I respect them because they're willing to use a lot of money to satisfy fans of their players.
q3: What colours do they play in?
a3: I am not sure, but I am sure they aren't winning colors!
